words.def: dividing an area into zones or sections reserved for different purposes such as residence and business and manufacturing etc
a brief high-pitched buzzing or humming sound
an angular shape characterized by sharp turns in alternating directions
a wooden pin pushed or driven into a surface
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
a hotel providing overnight lodging for travelers
a particle that is electrically charged (positive or negative)
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
